DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and efficacy of AN2728 Topical Ointment, 2% in children, adolescents, and adults (ages 2 years and older) with atopic dermatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AN2728 Topical Ointment, 2% in Children, Adolescents, and Adults (Ages 2 Years and Older) With Atopic Dermatitis
